metadata.title: CVE-2017-0356 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw, similar to to CVE-2016-9646, exists in ikiwiki before 3.20170111,in the passwordauth plugin's use of CGI::FormBuilder, allowing an attackerto bypass authentication via repeated parameters.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
